pages.text: The wilds of nature are filled with crops, plants, bushes, shrubs and trees. Within each of these is a spark of life that drives towards growth.$(br2)The process of germination slowly feeds these sparks, causing growth over a period of time.$(br2)$(info) Growth will not be as rapid when compared to such spells as $(l:spells/spell_growth_infusion)Growth Infusion$().
$(standing_stones) As a $(l:rituals/tiers)$(bold)tier I$() ritual, $(l:rituals/ritual_germination#multiblock)a single standing stone is required to begin$(). Please see later pages of this entry.
A single $(l:rituals/standing_stone)standing stone$() of runestone or runed obsidian is required.

pages.title: Ritual Specifics
pages.text: $(bold)Duration:$() The ritual lasts for $(ritual:germination/SECONDS/duration) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Size:$() Ritual area extends $(ritual:germination/radius_x) and $(ritual:germination/radius_z) blocks from the center, and vertically by $(ritual:germination/radius_y) blocks.$(br2)$(bold)Frequency:$() Growth is triggered every $(ritual:germination/SECONDS/interval) seconds, when a maximum of $(ritual:germination/count) growable blocks are granted $(ritual:germination/ticks) growth ticks.$(br2)Up to $(ritual:germination/bonus_ticks) bonus ticks can be applied to each growable.
$(bold)Frequency$(): Finally, $(ritual:germination/block_crop_ticks) ticks are applied to crops.
